This left the class with 120 - 30 = <<120-30=89>>89 pool floats that were actually part of the donations they need to organize.
This means there were a total of 60 basketball hoops + 89 pool floats + 50 footballs + 40 tennis balls = <<60+89+50+40=239>>239 donations that were not basketballs.
So out of the donations, there were 300 donations - 239 = <<300-239=61>>61 basketballs.
In addition, half of the basketball hoops were donated with a basketball included which amounts to 60 basketball hoops / 2 = <<60/2=30>>30 basketballs.
There was therefore a total of 61 + 30 = <<61+30=91>>91 basketballs donated.
